attributes.action: Accept WTO rules and leave the E.U. on 29 March 2019
attributes.additional_details: Various people including the Chairmen of both Next & Dyson have said they find no problems in operating under WTO rules; yet ‘the other side’ tell us it would be disastrous but give not one example
attributes.background: We were told ‘no deal is better than a bad deal’. So go to WTO rules and take back control of our country. Any hardships will only be for the short term; whereas the deal currently on offer is bad and will last a long, long time
